languages.text: "В остальном ситуация далека от удовлетворительной. Ваша, вне всякого сомнения, необходимая {d|Encyclopedia:BS_HeartlessDamaged}артподготовка{/d} значительно повредила судно. Мы, конечно, можем починить его и приспособить к делу. Пускай "Бессердечный" сопровождает флагман, или можем отправить его по торговому маршруту внутри владений династии. Это, конечно, обойдется в крупную сумму, но и выгоды солидны".
languages.translation_comment:
Если раздолбали корабль, играют этюды:
BS_NoReinfFromLift и

traits.locale_text: "В остальном ситуация далека от удовлетворительной. Ваша, вне всякого сомнения, необходимая {d|Encyclopedia:BS_HeartlessDamaged}артподготовка{/d} значительно повредила судно. Мы, конечно, можем починить его и приспособить к делу. Пускай "Бессердечный" сопровождает флагман, или можем отправить его по торговому маршруту внутри владений династии. Это, конечно, обойдется в крупную сумму, но и выгоды солидны".
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.translation_comment:
Если раздолбали корабль, играют этюды:
BS_NoReinfFromLift и

languages.text: "The rest is far from satisfactory. Your earlier {d|Encyclopedia:BS_HeartlessDamaged}artillery strike{/d} — though undeniably necessary — did severe damage to the ship. It can, of course, still be repaired and put to good use. We could have the Heartless escort our flagship or, say, carry goods along one of the trade routes within your domain. Those options aren't cheap by any means, but the benefits are enticing."
languages.original_text: "В остальном ситуация далека от удовлетворительной. Ваша, вне всякого сомнения, необходимая {d|Encyclopedia:BS_HeartlessDamaged}артподготовка{/d} значительно повредила судно. Мы, конечно, можем починить его и приспособить к делу. Пускай "Бессердечный" сопровождает флагман, или можем отправить его по торговому маршруту внутри владений династии. Это, конечно, обойдется в крупную сумму, но и выгоды солидны".

traits.locale_text: "The rest is far from satisfactory. Your prior artillery strike — which was undeniably necessary — did severe damage to the ship. It can, of course, still be repaired and put to use. We could have the Heartless escort our flagship or, say, carry goods along one of the trade routes within your domain. Those options certainly aren't cheap, but the benefits are promising."

"The rest is far from satisfactory. Your prior artillery strike — which was undeniably necessary — did severe damage to the ship. It can, of course, still be repaired and put to use. We could have the Heartless escort our flagship or, say, carry goods along one of the trade routes within your domain. Those options certainly aren't cheap, but the benefits are promising."

"The rest is far from satisfactory. Your earlier artillery strike — though undeniably necessary — did severe damage to the ship. It can, of course, still be repaired and put to good use. We could have the Heartless escort our flagship or, say, carry goods along one of the trade routes within your domain. Those options certainly aren't cheap, but the benefits are enticing."

"The rest is far from satisfactory. Your earlier artillery strike — though undeniably necessary — did severe damage to the ship. It can, of course, still be repaired and put to good use. We could have the Heartless escort our flagship or, say, carry goods along one of the trade routes within your domain. Those options certainly aren't cheap, but the benefits are enticing."

"The rest is far from satisfactory. Your earlier artillery strike — though undeniably necessary — did severe damage to the ship. It can, of course, still be repaired and put to good use. We could have the Heartless escort our flagship or, say, carry goods along one of the trade routes within your domain. Those options aren't cheap by any means, but the benefits are enticing."

"The rest is far from satisfactory. Your earlier {d|Encyclopedia:BS_HeartlessDamaged}artillery strike{/d} — though undeniably necessary — did severe damage to the ship. It can, of course, still be repaired and put to good use. We could have the Heartless escort our flagship or, say, carry goods along one of the trade routes within your domain. Those options aren't cheap by any means, but the benefits are enticing."

"The rest is far from satisfactory. Your earlier {d|Encyclopedia:BS_HeartlessDamaged}artillery strike{/d} — though undeniably necessary — did severe damage to the ship. It can, of course, still be repaired and put to good use. We could have the Heartless escort our flagship or, say, carry goods along one of the trade routes within your domain. Those options aren't cheap by any means, but the benefits are enticing."

languages.text: «El resto está lejos de ser satisfactorio. Su primer {d|Encyclopedia:BS_HeartlessDamaged}salvo de artillería{/d}, aunque indudablemente necesario, causó graves daños a la nave. Por supuesto, aún es posible repararla y utilizarla sin mayor problema. Podríamos hacer que la Desalmada escoltara a nuestra nave insignia o, por ejemplo, que transportara mercancía por alguna de las rutas comerciales de sus dominios. No son opciones de bajo coste, ni mucho menos, pero sus beneficios son muy interesantes».
languages.original_text: "The rest is far from satisfactory. Your earlier {d|Encyclopedia:BS_HeartlessDamaged}artillery strike{/d} — though undeniably necessary — did severe damage to the ship. It can, of course, still be repaired and put to good use. We could have the Heartless escort our flagship or, say, carry goods along one of the trade routes within your domain. Those options aren't cheap by any means, but the benefits are enticing."

traits.locale_text: «El resto está lejos de ser satisfactorio. Su primer salvo de artillería, aunque indudablemente necesario, causó graves daños a la nave. Por supuesto, aún es posible repararla y utilizarla sin mayor problema. Podríamos hacer que la Desalmada escoltara a nuestra nave insignia o, por ejemplo, que transportara mercancía por alguna de las rutas comerciales de sus dominios. No son opciones de bajo coste, ni mucho menos, pero sus beneficios son muy interesantes».

languages.text: “除此之外，状况恐怕远远无法令人满意。当然，不可否认，您之前的{d|Encyclopedia:BS_HeartlessDamaged}炮击{/d}是绝对必要的决定，但炮击对无心号造成了严重破坏。话虽如此，我们还是可以把这艘船修好，妥善利用。我们可以让无心号成为旗舰的护卫舰，又或者，可以让它在王朝的贸易路线上运送货物。每种选择都会耗费巨资，但带来的利益也相当诱人。”
languages.original_text: "The rest is far from satisfactory. Your earlier {d|Encyclopedia:BS_HeartlessDamaged}artillery strike{/d} — though undeniably necessary — did severe damage to the ship. It can, of course, still be repaired and put to good use. We could have the Heartless escort our flagship or, say, carry goods along one of the trade routes within your domain. Those options aren't cheap by any means, but the benefits are enticing."

traits.locale_text: “除此之外，状况恐怕远远无法令人满意。当然，不可否认，您之前的炮击是绝对必要的决定，但炮击对无心号造成了严重破坏。话虽如此，我们还是可以把这艘船修好，妥善利用。我们可以让无心号成为旗舰的护卫舰，又或者，可以让它在王朝的贸易路线上运送货物。每种选择都会耗费巨资，但带来的利益也相当诱人。”

languages.text: « Le reste, en revanche, est loin d'être satisfaisant. Bien qu'indéniablement nécessaire, votre {d|Encyclopedia:BS_HeartlessDamaged}frappe d'artillerie{/d} de tout à l'heure a infligé d'importants dégâts au vaisseau. Cela dit, une fois réparé, le Sans-Cœur a encore de beaux jours devant lui. Il pourrait servir d'escorte au vaisseau amiral, ou bien de navire marchand sur l'une des routes commerciales de votre domaine. Dans un cas comme dans l'autre, c'est un investissement important, mais les profits à la clé sont plus que prometteurs. »
languages.original_text: "The rest is far from satisfactory. Your earlier {d|Encyclopedia:BS_HeartlessDamaged}artillery strike{/d} — though undeniably necessary — did severe damage to the ship. It can, of course, still be repaired and put to good use. We could have the Heartless escort our flagship or, say, carry goods along one of the trade routes within your domain. Those options aren't cheap by any means, but the benefits are enticing."

traits.locale_text: « Le reste, en revanche, est loin d'être satisfaisant. Bien qu'indéniablement nécessaire, votre frappe d'artillerie de tout à l'heure a infligé d'importants dégâts au vaisseau. Cela dit, une fois réparé, le Sans-Cœur a encore de beaux jours devant lui. Il pourrait servir d'escorte au vaisseau amiral, ou bien de navire marchand sur l'une des routes commerciales de votre domaine. Dans un cas comme dans l'autre, c'est un investissement important, mais les profits à la clé sont plus que prometteurs. »

languages.text: 「残りは満足とはほど遠いです。先ほどの{d|Encyclopedia:BS_HeartlessDamaged}砲撃{/d}は、紛れもなく必要でしたが、船に甚大な被害が生じました。もちろん、それはまだ修復可能で、活用できます。私たちはハートレスに旗艦をエスコートさせるか、ドメイン内の貿易ルートの一つに沿って物品を運ばせることができました。これらの選択肢は決して安くはありませんが、利益を引きつけます」
languages.original_text: "The rest is far from satisfactory. Your earlier {d|Encyclopedia:BS_HeartlessDamaged}artillery strike{/d} — though undeniably necessary — did severe damage to the ship. It can, of course, still be repaired and put to good use. We could have the Heartless escort our flagship or, say, carry goods along one of the trade routes within your domain. Those options aren't cheap by any means, but the benefits are enticing."

traits.locale_text: 「残りは満足とはほど遠いです。先ほどの砲撃は、紛れもなく必要でしたが、船に甚大な被害が生じました。もちろん、それはまだ修復可能で、活用できます。私たちはハートレスに旗艦をエスコートさせるか、ドメイン内の貿易ルートの一つに沿って物品を運ばせることができました。これらの選択肢は決して安くはありませんが、利益を引きつけます」

languages.text: "Diğer gelişmeler ise tatmin edici olmaktan epey uzak. Gerekliliği inkâr edilemez olsa da {d|Encyclopedia:BS_HeartlessDamaged}yapılan top saldırısı{/d}, gemiye ciddi hasar verdi. Elbette hâlâ onarılabilir ve güzelce kullanılabilir durumda. Taşkalp, sancak geminize refakat edebilir veya diyarınızdan geçen ticaret yollarında mal taşıyabilir. Bu seçeneklerin hiçbiri ucuz olmasa da faydaları oldukça cazip."
languages.original_text: "The rest is far from satisfactory. Your earlier {d|Encyclopedia:BS_HeartlessDamaged}artillery strike{/d} — though undeniably necessary — did severe damage to the ship. It can, of course, still be repaired and put to good use. We could have the Heartless escort our flagship or, say, carry goods along one of the trade routes within your domain. Those options aren't cheap by any means, but the benefits are enticing."

traits.locale_text: "Diğer gelişmeler ise tatmin edici olmaktan epey uzak. Gerekliliği inkâr edilemez olsa da yapılan top saldırısı, gemiye ciddi hasar verdi. Elbette hâlâ onarılabilir ve güzelce kullanılabilir durumda. Taşkalp, sancak geminize refakat edebilir veya diyarınızdan geçen ticaret yollarında mal taşıyabilir. Bu seçeneklerin hiçbiri ucuz olmasa da faydaları oldukça cazip."

languages.text: "Der Rest ist alles andere als zufriedenstellend. Euer {d|Encyclopedia:BS_HeartlessDamaged}Artillerieangriff{/d} – so wichtig er zweifellos war – hat das Schiff stark beschädigt. Es kann natürlich trotzdem repariert und wieder in Dienst gestellt werden. Die Heartless könnte Euer Flaggschiff eskortieren oder als Transportschiff innerhalb Eures Reiches zum Einsatz kommen. Beide Optionen sind keineswegs billig, könnten aber sehr profitabel sein."
languages.original_text: "The rest is far from satisfactory. Your earlier {d|Encyclopedia:BS_HeartlessDamaged}artillery strike{/d} — though undeniably necessary — did severe damage to the ship. It can, of course, still be repaired and put to good use. We could have the Heartless escort our flagship or, say, carry goods along one of the trade routes within your domain. Those options aren't cheap by any means, but the benefits are enticing."

traits.locale_text: "Der Rest ist alles andere als zufriedenstellend. Euer Artillerieangriff – so wichtig er zweifellos war – hat das Schiff stark beschädigt. Es kann natürlich trotzdem repariert und wieder in Dienst gestellt werden. Die Heartless könnte Euer Flaggschiff eskortieren oder als Transportschiff innerhalb Eures Reiches zum Einsatz kommen. Beide Optionen sind keineswegs billig, könnten aber sehr profitabel sein."
